row.Docu: It escapes the JIRA input parameters and wrap the parameter surrounded by quotes(").

row.process:
! We escape characters based on Platform for java Strings
: SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#, "%", "%%") : CASE "UNIX" : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#, "\", "\\") : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#, "$", "\$") : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#, "`", "\`") : OTHER : ENDSWITCH
! Escape double-quotes : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#, '"', '\"')
! then we add double-quotes to String to preserve spaces in value : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT('"', &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#) : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#, '"')
